name: Crazy Wizard Game
description:
Experience the might of your own power destroying you at every turn! Fun.

Also get to the end for a special surprise that's sure to match the quality of your favorite games!

Was made for the Game Makers Toolkit 2020 Jam, but Unity decided that it didn't want to work so I had to spend an extra 30 minutes past the deadline figuring it out. So that was cool.

Credits:

Kyle Burnett (me) - programming, sprites, music

Chase Burnett - all sounds in the game, 3D models

Emily Bruce - additional sprites
